page.title: 04 The Ragley Hall Gamekeeper
page.content: The gamekeeper of Ragley Hall is Mr.Ward.His year's work is split into three seasons: 1.From the 1st of February to about the middle of May he feeds the birds in the wild and catches and kills vermin ie. foxes,rats,stoats,weasels etc. 2.Mid May to the middle of September he rears partridges and pheasants and releases them into the fields.He rears 2300 pheasants and 1200 partridges.Pheasants go to the woods at seven weeks old.Partridges go at twelve weeks. 3.Mid September to the end of January he feeds the birds in the woods and fields and a syndicate of guns starts shooting them.Each year there is an average of about 1200 pheasants killed and 600 partridges killed.The guns pay a cash sum to cover rent of ground, gamekeeper's wages,chicks and feed.
